com.google.appinventor.components.runtime

Class NearField

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.appinventor.components.runtime.AndroidNonvisibleComponent
      • com.google.appinventor.components.runtime.NearField
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Component, Deleteable, OnNewIntentListener, OnPauseListener, OnResumeListener, OnStopListener

    public class NearField
extends AndroidNonvisibleComponent
implements OnStopListener, OnResumeListener, OnPauseListener, OnNewIntentListener, Deleteable
    Controller for Near Field Communication

        public void TagRead(String message)
